 When I type `Bob` in field located `accessibilityId(username)`
 ----
 
+=== Swipe to element
+
+==== *_Info_*
+
+Swipes to element in either UP or DOWN direction with the specified duration
+
+==== *_Wording_*
+
+[source,gherkin]
+----
+When I swipe $direction to element located `$locator` with duration $swipeDuration
+----
+
+==== Properties
+
+* `mobile-application.swipe.limit` - defines a swipe limit number by exceeding which swipe process fails
+* `mobile-application.swipe.stabilization-duration` - defines a duration to wait after swipe until view becomes unchangeable, this plays a role in 'end of scrollable view' determination which is based on image comparison
+
+==== *_Parameters_*
+
+. `$direction` - direction to swipe, either UP or DOWN
+. `$locator` - <<_locator>>
+. `$duration` - duration between a touch pointer moves from the start to the end of the swipe coordinates in {iso-date-format-link} format
